short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuietTube simplifies your YouTube experience by allowing you to focus on the content you choose to watch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuietTube simplifies your YouTube experience by hiding recommended videos, comments, and distractions, allowing you to focus on the content you choose to watch.
